\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
\begin{scope}[help lines]
\draw (-0.5,-0.5) grid (2.5,1.5);
\draw (0,0) -- (30:2);
\node at (0,0) {o};
\draw[|-|] (0,-0.1) --node[below]{dist=2} (2,-0.1);
\draw[|->|] (2.1,0) arc (0:30:2.1);
\node at (1.45,0.2) {deg=30};
\end{scope}

% angle 30, distance 2
\node at (30:2) {u};

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
